pages.text:
Quality & Community
ABOUT US
The Butcher & The Bar
A Culinary Experience Like No Other
Welcome to The Butcher & The Bar, a gastropub in Boynton Beach, offering a unique blend of a full-service retail butcher shop, premium bar, and dining venue. Our butcher shop specializes in whole animal butchery, featuring regionally sourced, clean meats, and house-made specialties. We proudly source our ingredients locally to ensure the highest quality and freshest flavors.
Our menu features freshly crafted sandwiches straight from the butcher, alongside house-made sides. The creative and ever-changing “Butcher Bites” menu highlights fresh products from our butcher shop, ensuring daily variety and quality. Check our Daily Menu to see what’s fresh today!
Enjoy our old-school cocktail area, where vinyl records set the mood. Our bar serves high-quality wines, spirits, and beers, focusing on local and regional brews. Cocktails are made with premium ingredients and fresh-squeezed juices.
Join us for an unforgettable experience that blends tradition with innovation, providing high-quality food, beverages, and exceptional service in a relaxed atmosphere.
Locally Fresh
We are dedicated to offering exceptionally fresh, locally sourced ingredients that enhance our community connection. Our close partnerships with regional farmers and artisans ensure that our menu features the best available produce and meats, enriching each dish with superior freshness and flavor. This focus on local excellence not only supports our community but also ensures a genuine taste experience with every meal.
Our Menu
The Events
Memorable Moments, Tasteful Palates
Our events combine great food, fine drinks, and a warm ambiance to create memorable experiences. Whether it’s a wine tasting, a tequila night, or a charcuterie, we offer engaging events, perfect for socializing and celebrating.
Our Events

Upcoming Events
Our events combine great food, fine drinks, and a warm ambiance to create memorable experiences. Whether it’s a wine tasting, a tequila night, or a charcuterie, we offer engaging events, perfect for socializing and celebrating.
08/19/2024
Battle of the Beaches
Cocktail Showdown begins August 19th! Driftwood, Sweetwater, and The Butcher & The Bar have teamed up to host the showdown of bartenders from 9 area restaurants. The event will take place in 6 parts, running from August 19th through November 25th. Details available on our social media pages, or follow @battleofthebeachesshowdown.
08/26/2024
Tom's Louisiana Kitchen Pop-up
Join us for a special pop-up with Chef Tom Tannozzini, who will be taking over our kitchen to offer up his Cajun and Creole specialties. Details available on social media.
09/10/2024
Battle of the Beaches
Cocktail Showdown, Preliminary Round 1 here at The Butcher & The Bar. No reservations or tickets necessary. Starts at 6p, doors open at 5p.
09/16/2024
"Redacted" Dinner
“Redacted” Dinner, with Florida Honey Bees and Barr Hill spirits. Learn about the importance of honeybees to our food chain while enjoying a four-course meal prepared by our Chef and paired with cocktails made from Barr Hill Vodka and Gin (both made with honey). The menu will be redacted to demonstrate the value of honeybees to our food supply chain. It will be a one-of-a-kind event, not to be missed. $120++ per person; $25pp deposit.
